sense.name: the physiological activation of an organism or organ
sense.examples: This exercise is great for the stimulation of your cardiovascular system. The experiment involves the stimulation of different nerves with mild electric shocks.

sense.name: engaging, interesting activity
sense.examples: The brightest students are getting almost no stimulation in these classes. It was a great stimulation to Mary to get out of the office for two weeks and travel to China. Daily walks provide your pet with both exercise and mental stimulation.

sense.name: sexual foreplay
sense.commentary: STIMULATION[+event][+physiological][+activation][+of_organism][+foreplay][+sexual] Note: a narrow, specialized usage of Sense 1
sense.examples: That shop sells aids for sexual stimulation. The case centers on whether the sexual stimulation occurred between consenting adults.
